resources.string:
Welcome. 


Get started and selected some newsources you want to follow. 


Simply swipe with your finger from the left margin or click the button in the upper right corner to open the news sources menu. 
 

Tap on the sources you want to here from. 
 

Enjoy your news.
NewsLink android application, made with blood, sweat and pain by Rico Klimpel. \n\npowered by newsapi.org
